exceptions.exn: The reference Derive_correct was not found in the current environment.
In environment f : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule x : R_AbsRing l : R_NormedModule H : is_derive f x l Unable to unify "is_derive f x l" with "Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0 = l".
